etymology.description: Depicts a cauldron (䰜) -> ancient form of 鬲(鬲) (lì, "cauldron") -> evolved into 鬲(鬲) as a separate character depicting pottery
etymology.interpretation: 䰜(䰜) (lì, "cauldron") is a pictogram that represents an ancient form of the cooking vessel depicted in the character 鬲(鬲). It visually represents the cauldron and is directly related to 鬲(鬲) as both share the same depiction of a pottery vessel.
